# 🆘 Support Guide

Thanks for using this project! Here’s how to get help if you run into issues or have questions.

---

## 🔎 Before You Ask

Please check the following before opening a support request:

- 📓 Read the [README](../README.md) and project documentation.
- 🔍 Search [issues](../../issues) to see if your question has already been answered.
- 📖 Read the project [wiki] for additional documentation and guides.
- 🧪 Try reproducing the issue with the latest version.

---

## 💬 Where to Ask Questions

- 🐛 **Bug Reports:**  
  Use the **Bug Report** issue template and provide all relevant info.

- 🚀 **Feature Requests:**  
  Use the **Feature Request** issue template and describe your idea clearly.

---

## 🙏 Thanks!

We appreciate your patience and contributions. Thanks for being here!
